reviewText: I actually wanted the Fifth Element blu-ray movie but since there's a Bundle Set of two movies sold at the price of one and I kinda like Gattaca, why miss-out on it! Anyway, here's my review:-FIFTH ELEMENTThis is a must have, fun sci-fi movie, just pure fun. Leave your brain at the refrigerator and just simply enjoy the `90s CGI, set design and the comedy (especially Chris Tucker)Good PQ and AQ for a 15 year old movie but sadly the Extras are terribly lacking here. I'd expect a sci-fi movie of this kind would have loads of extras especially on creature designs, costume designs, spacecraft design and CGI development, etc. but none were available here. Just some trivia.Movie: 5Video: 4.5Audio: 4.5Extra: 1Overall: 4GATTACAThis movie is totally opposite to Fifth Element. It's not fun but very interesting. A story of human struggle to reach his dreams against the discrimination of the future...DNA superiority. The movie setting is kinda low key, using `50s/'60s costumes, building and cars instead of purposely designing/using something totally futuristic.The PQ and AQ here are also good for a 15 year old movie but the subtitles are disgustingly odd! Big white font infront of a black box that blocks the movie scenes. Sadly, the Extras here is also lacking with only 1 specially done for the blu-ray release. The worst Deleted Scene quality I've seen so far for a blu-ray movie.Movie: 4.5Video: 4.5Audio: 4.5Extra: 2Overall: 4So in conclusion, I'd recommend sci-fi fan to buy this FIFTH ELEMENT/GATTACA Bundle. A great combo of 2 different type of sci-fi movie at the price of one. As for the rating:-Fifth Element (4) + Gattaca (4) /2 = 4
summary: A Great Bundle of Two Different Type of Sci-Fi Movie at the Price of One

reviewText: The Fifth Element, one of the FINEST SCIFI Movies ever made.  If you love SCI-FI, you need to get this movie for your SCI-FI movie library.  You will love it.

reviewText: Only for fifth element this movie worth every penny .Turn on Fact trivia while watching movie and almost every scene tell you something about movie ,actor ,sets,story..etc .After viewing it i wish all movie can add this feature .Blu ray conversion and Audio mix is top notch .People been talking about bad quality of disc and audio .probably its fixed because it knocked socks out of my sound system and graphics conversion looked awesome on my samsung LED.Easily one of top 5 conversion in my collection so far.Gattaca is something different .If your genera is cult classic with likes of donnie darko but not much of inception .You`ll love it there aren`t any special effects .Movie is slow but they added murder mystery to keep it interesting.Its not typical Hollywood cloning movie like sixth day( by Arnold).I didn`t appreciate much of blu ray conversion or audio upgrade in this one but again it was a combo price .
summary: Fifth element is Five Star product
